23) Earth and Space – Multiple Choice Crater Lake in Oregon is an example of a caldera [kahl-DARE- ah]. Which of the following statements best describes how this caldera formed? W) A lava dam blocked a river and later broke free, forming the caldera X) A mega-eruption blew off the side of Mount Mazama [mah-ZAH-mah] Y) A lava dome formed in the crater and later eroded leaving the caldera behind Z) The summit of Mount Mazama collapsed into the empty magma chamber below
answer:
Z) THE SUMMIT OF MOUNT MAZAMA COLLAPSED INTO THE EMPTY MAGMA
CHAMBER BELOW
